channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: Yom Kippur is a day in which the sanctuary is cleansed of the record of forgiven sins of Israel; the Bible tells in Hebrews Chapter 8 that the sanctuary and its services is a type of the sanctuary in heaven where Jesus ministers as high priest.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: IIW Sabbath School
channel.desc: The host, along with a panel of religious scholars, conduct various discussions to provide an in-depth insight into various topics from the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.[(96057)]
